programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o trandom.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
seed 0 ; every run time different values
instr 1
kmin init 0 ;random number between 0 and 220 kmax init 220 ktrig = p4 k1 trandom ktrig, kmin, kmax printk2 k1 ;print when k1 changes asig poscil .4, 220+k1, 1 ;if triggered, add random values to frequency outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 4096 10 1
i 1 0 2 0 ;not triggered i 1 + 2 1 ;triggered e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
